meanings.sent1: We will cotransfer the files to the new computer.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to cotransfer the responsibilities to ensure equal workload.
meanings.sent3: The siblings cotransferred the blame to each other for the broken vase.
meanings.sent4: The dancers cotransferred their energy, moving in perfect sync.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters cotransferred the injured person out of the burning building.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring something jointly or together.
meanings.sent1: The cotransfer of ownership was completed smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She requested a cotransfer of funds between her accounts.
meanings.sent3: The cotransfer of knowledge between generations is crucial for progress.
meanings.sent4: The cotransfer of emotions between the characters made the scene powerful.
meanings.sent5: The cotransfer of responsibilities among the team members improved efficiency.
